capital_history.note: Pilot capital for swing trading system

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake_description: Chased momentum - bought near day highs after big moves
what_went_wrong: Entered HINDZINC at ₹692 when it was at 52-week high (₹696.90)
Entered HINDCOPPER after +3.18% move, massive volume spike
Did not wait for pullback or consolidation
Both positions hit stop loss within 24 hours
correct_approach: Wait for pullback after big moves (RSI 45-55 range)
Don't chase 52-week high breakouts - wait for confirmation next day
Massive volume spike = exhaustion, not strength
Mid-day entries are risky - prefer 9:15-10:00 AM window
Use wider stop loss for volatile sectors (metals need 4-5%)
checklist_before_entry: ✓ Wait for pullback if stock up >2% intraday
✓ Enter in morning (9:15-10:30 AM), avoid mid-day
✓ Stop loss 4-5% for metals, 3-4% for others
✓ Confirm sector strength, not just single stock
✓ Don't enter multiple positions in same sector
mistakes_to_avoid.status: Active - Must check before every entry
